channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Steelers interviewing Mike McCarthy, Will they find the right head coach? | The Herd
item.description: The Pittsburgh Steelers are interviewing Mike McCarthy and Brian Flores for their vacant head coach position. Colin Cowherd asks if the Steelers can b...

item.title: John Harbaugh ‘excited’ to coach Giants, Can he elevate Jaxson Dart and the team? | The Herd
item.description: John Harbaugh is the new head coach of the New York Giants, and is excited to coach the team. Colin Cowherd asks if he can elevate New York into a con...

item.title: John Lynch: 'Safe to Say Brandon Aiyuk Has Played His Last Snap With the 49ers'
item.description: President of Football Operations John Lynch said Wednesday that Brandon Aiyuk "has [likely] played his last snap" with the 49ers.

item.title: UConn, Vanderbilt Schedule Women's Basketball Series for 2027-28 and 2028-29
item.description: The UConn and Vanderbilt women’s basketball teams have set up a home-and-home series for the 2027-28 and 2028-29 seasons

item.title: Cristiano Ronaldo and 1,000 Goals: Portugal Star Scores No. 960 in Al-Nassr Win
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scored his 960th official goal of his career, leaving him 40 shy of reaching a monumental landmark.

item.title: QB Mensah can enter portal, can't sign until ruling
item.description: Duke QB Darian Mensah is permitted to enter the transfer portal, but can't enroll at another school or play football for another college team before a...

item.title: Sources: Yanks giving Bellinger 5 years, $162.5M
item.description: The Yankees and outfielder Cody Bellinger are ending their offseason standoff by agreeing to a five-year, $162.5 million contract, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Coach: Bears QB, receivers need better chemistry
item.description: Among the areas Ben Johnson feels the Bears need to improve most next season is the chemistry between quarterback Caleb Williams and his pass catchers...

item.title: Liberty, Fever among the top 2026 WNBA schedule reveals on social media
item.description: The 2026 WNBA schedule is out and teams announced their calendar in their own creative ways on social media.

item.title: Mixon's Texans future unclear after 'freak' injury
